thread.title: Dow tumbles 724 points on trade war fears

title: Dow tumbles 724 points on trade war fears
text:
Dow tumbles 724 points on trade war fears Thursday, March 22, 2018 - 02:02 
Wall Street fell sharply Thursday as President Trump unveiled new tariffs aimed at Chinese goods and investment, sparking fear of a trade war between the world's two biggest economies. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Wall Street fell sharply Thursday as President Trump unveiled new tariffs aimed at Chinese goods and investment, sparking fear of a trade war between the world's two biggest economies.
